input: Well, if I want to convert two radians, again, I have degrees, so I've got to divide by degrees, or put the degrees on the bottom to cancel out. Degrees will cancel with degrees, and I'm left with radians on top.
offline_reference: 嗯，如果我想把两个弧度转换成角度，同样地，我需要除以每弧度对应的度数，或者将度数放在分母位置以便约去，这样度数与度数相消后，就只剩下弧度在分子上。
